测试目录：
一．Beq 与 cal_r/ cal_i/ load冲突
二．Cal_r/ cal_i 与load冲突
三．load_rs 与load_rt冲突
四．store_rs 与load rt冲突
五．jr_rs 与cal_r/ cal_i / load冲突
一．
ori $3,$0,123
addu $4,$0,$3
beq $4,$3,next1
nop
ori $9,$0,99
next1:
addu $5,$4,$0
ori $6,$0,123
beq $6,$5,next2
nop
ori $9,$0,88
next2:
sw $6,0($0)
lw $7,0($0)
lw $8,0($0)
beq $7,$8,next3
nop
ori $9,$0,77
next3:
ori $9,$0,100

3403007b
00032021
10830002
00000000
34090063
00802821
3406007b
10c50002
00000000
34090058
ac060000
8c070000
8c080000
10e80002
00000000
3409004d
34090064

@00003000: $ 3 <= 0000007b
@00003004: $ 4 <= 0000007b
@00003014: $ 5 <= 0000007b
@00003018: $ 6 <= 0000007b
@00003028: *00000000 <= 0000007b
@0000302c: $ 7 <= 0000007b
@00003030: $ 8 <= 0000007b
@00003040: $ 9 <= 00000064

二：
ori $8,$0,123
sw $8,0($0)
lw $9,0($0)
addu $10,$9,$9
lw $10,0($0)
ori $11,$10,0
sw $11,1024($0)

二进制：
3408007b
ac080000
8c090000
01295021
8c0a0000
354b0000
ac0b0400

@00003000: $ 8 <= 0000007b
@00003004: *00000000 <= 0000007b
@00003008: $ 9 <= 0000007b
@0000300c: $10 <= 000000f6
@00003010: $10 <= 0000007b
@00003014: $11 <= 0000007b
@00003018: *00000400 <= 0000007b

三：（其实算转发）
ori $3,$0,12
sw $3,0($0)
lw $4,0($0)
sw $3,0($4)
lw $5,0($0)
lw $6,0($4)
3403000c
ac030000
8c040000
ac830000
8c050000
8c860000

@00003000: $ 3 <= 0000000c
@00003004: *00000000 <= 0000000c
@00003008: $ 4 <= 0000000c
@0000300c: *0000000c <= 0000000c
@00003010: $ 5 <= 0000000c
@00003014: $ 6 <= 0000000c

四：
ori $3,$0,16
sw $3,0($0)
lw $4,0($0)
sw $4,4($0)
lw $6,4($0)
sw $6,8($0)
lw $7,8($0)
sw $7,12($0)
lw $8,12($0)
sw $8,0($8)
lw $9,0($8)
sw $9,4($9)
lw $10,4($9)
addu $11,$10,$10

ac07000c
8c08000c
ad080000
8d090000

@00003000: $ 3 <= 00000010
@00003004: *00000000 <= 00000010
@00003008: $ 4 <= 00000010
@0000300c: *00000004 <= 00000010
@00003010: $ 6 <= 00000010
@00003014: *00000008 <= 00000010
@00003018: $ 7 <= 00000010
@0000301c: *0000000c <= 00000010
@00003020: $ 8 <= 00000010
@00003024: *00000010 <= 00000010
@00003028: $ 9 <= 00000010
@0000302c: *00000014 <= 00000010
@00003030: $10 <= 00000010
@00003034: $11 <= 00000020

五：
ori $3,$0,0x00003010 #16
jr $3 #4
nop#8
ori $4,$0,123 #12
ori $5,$0,0x00003010 #16
ori $6,$0,24#24
addu $7,$5,$6 #24
jr $7 #28
nop
ori $1,$0,123
addu $9,$7,$7

00600008
